publicationStmt.publisher: in the fletestrete at ye syne of the sonne by Wynkyn de worde.,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Enprynted in the famous cyte of London :
publicationStmt.date: In the yere of our lorde. M.v. and.x. [1510]

notesStmt.note: "The which book Robert Coplande ha[th] ... applyed for to translate out of the frensshe language in to our maternal Englysshe tongue" --p. [2].
